mapper.select: select id, start_time, end_time, ani, dnis, media_type, call_type, connid, guid, interaction_id, queue_id, queue_duration, queue_result, queue_scene, create_time, update_time from t_skill_detail where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_skill_detail(start_time, end_time, ani, dnis, media_type, call_type, connid, guid, interaction_id, queue_id, queue_duration, queue_result, queue_scene, create_time, update_time) values (#{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{ani}, #{dnis}, #{mediaType}, #{callType}, #{connid}, #{guid}, #{interactionId}, #{queueId}, #{queueDuration}, #{queueResult}, #{queueScene}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into t_skill_detail(start_time, end_time, ani, dnis, media_type, call_type, connid, guid, interaction_id, queue_id, queue_duration, queue_result, queue_scene, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.startTime}, #{entity.endTime}, #{entity.ani}, #{entity.dnis}, #{entity.mediaType}, #{entity.callType}, #{entity.connid}, #{entity.guid}, #{entity.interactionId}, #{entity.queueId}, #{entity.queueDuration}, #{entity.queueResult}, #{entity.queueScene}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into t_skill_detail(start_time, end_time, ani, dnis, media_type, call_type, connid, guid, interaction_id, queue_id, queue_duration, queue_result, queue_scene, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.startTime}, #{entity.endTime}, #{entity.ani}, #{entity.dnis}, #{entity.mediaType}, #{entity.callType}, #{entity.connid}, #{entity.guid}, #{entity.interactionId}, #{entity.queueId}, #{entity.queueDuration}, #{entity.queueResult}, #{entity.queueScene}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update start_time = values(start_time), end_time = values(end_time), ani = values(ani), dnis = values(dnis), media_type = values(media_type), call_type = values(call_type), connid = values(connid), guid = values(guid), interaction_id = values(interaction_id), queue_id = values(queue_id), queue_duration = values(queue_duration), queue_result = values(queue_result), queue_scene = values(queue_scene), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update t_skill_detail
start_time = #{startTime},
end_time = #{endTime},
ani = #{ani},
dnis = #{dnis},
media_type = #{mediaType},
call_type = #{callType},
connid = #{connid},
guid = #{guid},
interaction_id = #{interactionId},
queue_id = #{queueId},
queue_duration = #{queueDuration},
queue_result = #{queueResult},
queue_scene = #{queueScene},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
